title: New: Nouv Shy – Past (Feat. Gorgeous Gustroder)
body:
This hauntingly delicate track comes courtesy of Sweden’s **Nouv Shy** aka Carl Boman, featuring [Gorgeous Gustroder](https://soundcloud.com/gltorne), although I’m not entirely sure in what capacity. Past almost feels like a long lost brother to **RY X’s** Berlin; lovelorn, tender and emotionally fraught. Listen below.

_I would run with you for miles_
